name: Patagonia Nine Trails 4" Shorts - Women's
description:
Whether you’re running 25K or bushwhacking on an overgrown route, these lightweight endurance shorts keep you comfortable. The built-in liner helps prevent chafing and wicks moisture. Side scoops and a 4in. inseam let you stride freely.Soft, breathable shell fabric (91% recycled polyester and 9% spandex) moves with you and resists snagging.DWR finish sheds rain and splashes so they won't weigh you down.Moisture-wicking built-in polyester lining resists chafing, and Polygiene odour control treatment keeps it smelling fresh.Flat-knit waistband and drawcord ensure a comfortable fit.1in. side scoops and 4in. inseam allow easy range of motion.Zippered rear right hip pocket keeps your essentials secure.

        Sustainability
